abilities.desc: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt. Deals double damage to creeps and illusions.
abilities.name: Impetus
abilities.notes: Distance to target is measured when the projectile hits.

abilities.desc: Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control, increasing its attack damage and max health. Only one creep can be controlled at a time.DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.name: Enchant

abilities.desc: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts [9, 10, 11, 12] seconds.
abilities.name: Nature's Attendants
abilities.notes: Units with full HP will not be selected for the heal.

abilities.desc: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the 3 furthest enemy units within Enchantress\' attack range + 200.
abilities.name: Sproink

abilities.desc: All creeps, ally, enemy and neutral within a radius will gain bonus movement and attack speed and attack Enchantress\' chosen target for 6 seconds.
abilities.name: Little Friends

abilities.desc: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.
abilities.name: Untouchable
abilities.notes: The slow is applied on the attacking unit when the attack starts, not when damage is applied.
